// Variant (reach rest configuration) of https://shadertoy.com/view/cld3zX
// variant2 (uncomment line32) of https://www.shadertoy.com/view/DstXRs
// 3-knotted axis variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/DdcXRj

#define N true                                                             // display the triangle normal ( green )
#define rot(a)        mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))                         // 2D rotation 
#define rot3(P,A,a)  ( mix( A*dot(P,A), P, cos(a) ) + sin(a)*cross(P,A) )  // 3D rot around an arbitrary axis
  
#define L(q) length(q.xy - vec2(1.2,-1.5*sin(clamp(q.z,-1.57,1.57))) ) -.2 // 3-knot cylinders SDF
//#define L(q) length(q.xy - vec2(1,0)) -.2                                // 3 no-knot cylinders SDF
#define d(q)  ( min(                                                       \
                  min( r= L((q).yzx), N ? g= max(length(q)-1.5,length(q-dot(q,vec3(1./3.))))-.1 : 1e2 ), \
                  min( w= L((q).zxy),                                      \
                       b= L((q).xyz)                                       \
              )    ) )

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9., w=0.,r=w,b=w,g=w;
    vec3  R = iResolution,
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -12.*R.y) - R),                          // ray direction
          p = vec3(0,0,90), q,a,                                           // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? 6.*iMouse.xyz/R -3.
                            : vec3(-.8,0,0); // vec3(0,1.,0) // vec3(.5,-.5,0)
        p.yz *= rot(-M.y),                                                 // camera rotations
        p.xz *= rot(-M.x), 
        D.yz *= rot(-M.y),
        D.xz *= rot(-M.x); 

    for ( O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.005 )                        // march scene  
        q = p,
#if 1                                                                      // set 0 for no antitwister
 # if 1  // anti-deform with antitwister(0) so as to obtain the "rest configuration" at t=4.5
        a = vec3(sin(0.),0,cos(0.)),                              
        a = rot3( a, vec3(.71,0,-.71), -3.14/2. ),                           
        q = rot3( q,a, -3.14 *smoothstep(.05, .6, 1./length(p)) ),
 #endif
        a = vec3(sin(iTime),0,cos(iTime)),
        a = rot3( a, vec3(.71,0,-.71), 3.14/2. ),                          // variant
        q = rot3( q,a, 
               // 3.14 *smoothstep(8., 0., length(p)) ),                   // the magic is there
                  3.14 *smoothstep(.05, .6, 1./length(p)) ),
               // 3.14 ),                                                  // test: rot with no antitwister
#endif
        q = rot3( q,vec3(.71,0,-.71), .6 ),                                //  make triangle vertical             
     // q = rot3( q,vec3(.71,0,-.71), .955 ), // acos(1/sqrt(3))                                       
     // J = inverse( mat3( D(p+e) -q, D(p+e.yxy) -q, D(p+e.yyx) -q ) / e.x ), // Jacobian
        t = d(q),                                                          
        p += .2*t*D;                                                       // step forward = dist to obj      

    O *= O*O*2.;                                                           // color scheme
    O *= vec4( t==r, t==g, t==b, 1)*vec4(2,1,2,1) + float(t==w);
    if (O.a < 0.) O += .9;                                                 // white background
}
